resources.string: Legal aid is the provision of assistance to people who are unable to afford legal representation.

Please follow the following steps

 Start->Housing->You have living in rented accommodation->Eviction-> Check if you qualify financially
Please click to the link to find the eligibility for legal aid checklegalaid.com
6A Acre Lane London SW2 5SG\n\n The best way to contact us is by phone or email.
